alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:10PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Holt County through 800 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Atkinson, or 11 miles west of O`Neill, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`neill, O`Neill, Inman and Emmet. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 292 and 316. Highway 281 between mile markers 177 and 190. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
